## errorText() function

Returns the error text for an error code.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function errorText(error: number): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  error | number | The error code |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

The error message
